    • isConnected

      public int isConnected(validateGraph graph)
      This method checks if the graph is connected or not.
      Parameters:
      graph - represents the graph
      Returns:
      returns 0 and 1 depending on isconnected.

    • DFS

      public void DFS(int source, LinkedList<Integer>[] adjacencyList, boolean[] visited)
      This method is used for DFS route.
      Parameters:
      source - refers to the source country from where we are about to traverse from
      adjacencyList - refers to the adjacent countries/neighbors list
      visited - refers to the list of visited countries in the traversal

    • continentConnection

      public boolean continentConnection(Connectivity p_connectivity, validateGraph graph)
      This methods is used to check whether continents are connected or not.
      Parameters:
      p_connectivity - refers to the connectivity object
      graph - is the graph representation of the map
      Returns:
      true if continents are connected; false if continents are not connected
